scripts.server: echo " Running Express server " && nodemon server.js'
scripts.client: echo " Running Vue server " && cd client && npm run serve
scripts.start: echo " Heroku start script " && node server.js
scripts.build: echo " Build vue app " && cd client && npm run build
scripts.dev2: echo " Build Vue app and serve on express server " &&npm run build && npm run server
scripts.dev: echo " Running express and vue servers " && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
